Dilaporkan ke Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI Jakarta, PSI Siap Hadapi Konsekuensi
06 Nov 2019, 09:59 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Dilaporkan ke Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI Jakarta, PSI Siap Hadapi Konsekuensi

KBRN, Jakarta : Juru Bicara (Jubir) Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI) Rian Ernest mengatakan bahwa PSI siap menghadapi segala konsekuensi jika dipanggil oleh Badan Kehormatan (BK) DPRD DKI. Sepenuhnya PSI akan mendukung Anggota Fraksi Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI) DPRD DKI Jakarta, William Aditya."Sepertinya ada pelaporan ya yang disampaikan oleh seseorang ke badan kehormatan DPRD, ya jadi kita hadapi saja dengan lapang dada sebagai bagian dari konsekuensi membuka dugaan anggaran yang aneh di DKI Jakarta," jelasnya kepada RRI, Rabu (6/11/2019).Ia mengatakan bahwa PSI tidak memanfaatkan atau cari panggung saja. PSI hanya ingin masyarakat mengetahui apa saja yang menjadi kinerja eksekutif dibawah Gubernur Anies Baswedan."Jadi kita memang mencoba setransparan mungkin, sebenarnya kata kunci disini adalah transparansi itu kata kuncinya dengan adanya transparansi yang memilih kami, tau kami kerjanya ngapain dan juga yang mungkin kemarin memilih Anies Baswedan mengetahui seperti apa sih kinerja eksekutif dibawah gubernur Anies Baswedan," katanya.Ia mengkritik bahwa ada dua tahapan jika ingin menentukan sebuah penganggaran yakni penentuan platform dan pembahasan anggaran APBD. Jika keduanya saja tidak mempunyai patokan yang jelas, maka sudah pasti semuanya akan menjadi berantakan."Nah sekarang DKI Jakarta ibu kota negara PNS-nya sudah punya kemampuan diatas rata-rata, masa sih sekarang di tahun 2019 di tahap penentuan plat form saja belum matang," imbuhnya."Masa sih wajar apabila ada lem aibon sekian puluh miliar itu masih dianggarkan juga alasannya salah ketik lah, ada juga beberapa rumor mengatakan, ya memang gitu lah cara kita menganggarkan kita patok dulu aja anggarannya yang penting ada slot. Nah, ini kan cara manajemen menurut kami bukan manajemen sebuah ibu kota negara dong. Sama sekali tidak rapi dan tidak ada perencanaan," tutupnya.Sebelumnya, anggaran fantastis untuk lem aibon itu terungkap oleh Anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta Fraksi Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI), William Aditya Sarana, yang diungkapkan melalui akun media sosial Twitter-nya @willsarana.Menurutnya, ada keanehan dari anggaran senilai Rp82,8 miliar yang diperuntukkan untuk membeli lem aibon bagi 37.500 orang selama 12 bulan. Lantaran, dengan kata lain harga lem aibon itu sebesar Rp184 ribu per buah.“Ditemukan anggaran aneh pembelian lem aibon 82 milliar lebih oleh Dinas Pendidikan. Ternyata Dinas Pendidikan mensuplai 2 kaleng lem Aibon per murid setiap bulannya,” kata dia melalui akun Twitter @willsarana.Sementara itu, Sekretaris Dinas Pendidikan DKI, Susi Nurhati, sempat menyatakan bahwa anggaran tersebut dimungkinkan salah ketik sehingga nampak sangat besar."Ini sepertinya salah ketik, kami sedang cek ke semua komponennya untuk diperbaiki, " kata Susi saat dihubungi wartawan, Selasa 29 Oktober 2019.

Reported to the DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Board, PSI is Ready to Face the Consequences
Nov 6, 2019, 09:59 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Reported to the DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Board, PSI is Ready to Face the Consequences

KBRN, Jakarta: Spokesperson (Spokesman) of the Indonesian Solidarity Party (PSI) Rian Ernest said that PSI was ready to face all the consequences if called by the Jakarta DPRD Honorary Body (BK). Fully PSI will support the Jakarta Solidarity Party (PSI) member of the Jakarta DPRD, William Aditya. "It seems like there was a report submitted by someone to the DPRD honorary body, so let's just face it openly as part of the consequences of opening strange budget allegations. in DKI Jakarta, "he explained to RRI, Wednesday (11/06/2019). He said that PSI did not use or find the stage. PSI just wants the public to know what is the executive performance under Governor Anies Baswedan. "So we really try to be as transparent as possible, in fact the key word here is transparency, the key word is with transparency that chose us, knowing what we did and what we might have chosen yesterday "Anies Baswedan knows what executive performance is under governor Anies Baswedan," he said. He criticized that there were two stages if he wanted to determine a budgeting namely the determination of the platform and discussion of the APBD budget. If neither of them has a clear benchmark, then surely everything will be a mess. "Now, DKI Jakarta, the capital city of the state civil servants, has above-average capability, now in 2019 the stage of determining the plate form is not yet ripe. "He added." It's normal if there are tens of billions of aibon glue that is still budgeted and the reason is typo, there are also some rumors saying, yes that's how we budget our budget first, the important thing is there is a slot. In our opinion, management is not management of a national capital. It's not neat and there is no planning, "he concluded. Previously, the fantastic budget for the aibon glue was revealed by DKI Jakarta DPRD Member Faction of the Indonesian Solidarity Party (PSI), William Aditya Sarana , which was disclosed through its Twitter social media account @ willsarana. According to him, there was an oddity of a budget of Rp. 82.8 billion which was earmarked to buy glue ibon for 37,500 people for 12 months. Because, in other words the price of aibon glue is Rp184 thousand per piece. "It was found that the budget for buying aibon glue is more than 82 billion by the Education Office. It turns out that the Education Office supplies 2 cans of Aibon glue per student every month, "he said through the Twitter account @ willsarana. Meanwhile, the Secretary of the DKI Education Agency, Susi Nurhati, had stated that the budget was possible to make a typo so it seemed very large." type, we are checking all of its components for repair, "Susi said when contacted by reporters on Tuesday, October 29, 2019.
